title: 1.31 Samuel and the Tragedy of King Saul
itunes:title: Samuel and the Tragedy of King Saul
description: King Saul becomes king of the Israelites, in four different ways. Samuel moves from being the last judge to the first prophet. I take the opportunity to introduce the Hebrew prophets, showing they were not fortune-tellers and sooth-sayers. They responded to political crises, and spoke about the here and now.
content:encoded: King Saul becomes king of the Israelites, in four different ways. Samuel moves from being the last judge to the first prophet. I take the opportunity to introduce the Hebrew prophets, showing they were not fortune-tellers and sooth-sayers. They responded to political crises, and spoke about the here and now.
itunes:subtitle: The prophet Samuel creates the first King of Israel
itunes:author: Garry Stevens
